author: Stereogum
title: Glastonbury Festival To Change Its Name To Something Dumb
text: The Glastonbury has been an institution in the UK for decades. Since its 1970 inception, it's been a crucial part of the cultural and musical landscape. And it's always been called Glastonbury. But in a couple of years, that'll change. The festival is planning to take a year off next year and to move, at … More »
